name: organism-react-scroll-nav
description: A React scroll spy library with flux
author: Hill <hill@kimo.com>

scripts.build:cjs: BABEL_ENV=build babel src -d build/cjs/src && BABEL_ENV=build babel ui -d build/cjs/ui
scripts.build:es: BABEL_ENV=es babel src -d build/es/src && BABEL_ENV=es babel ui -d build/es/ui
scripts.build: rm -rf build && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es
